info.author: alexander smishlajev
info.description:
fasttran is a simple tool using Translation Memory (TM) databases
to automate human text translations.  Unlike common Computer Aided
Translation (CAT) tools (OmegaT, for instance) fasttran has no
knobs to turn in the process of the translation.  Text segmentation,
TM operations et al. are all hidden under the cover; you just run
the translator, get back a half-translated document, and continue the
work with common text processor interface.

fasttran was designed to suit freelance translators who find evolved
interface of existing CAT tools too complicated to learn and
operate.
info.name: fasttran
